label: 後三年役
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The name given to the war between Minamoto Yoshiie and a part of the Kiyowara clan (uji) that took place in Dewa- and Mutsu-no-kuni. Scholars do not agree as to when it started or ended, and as to why it is called a Three-Years War. In this book its dates are given as 1083-1088. [源義家、清原、氏、出羽国、陸奥国]
